profileText: a Representative from Alabama; born in Coffee County, Ala., September 26, 1966; graduated from Enterprise High School, Enterprise, Ala., 1984; A.S., Enterprise State Junior College, Enterprise, Ala., 1988; attended Troy State University, Troy, Ala.; B.S., Auburn University, Auburn, Ala., 1992; Alabama Army National Guard; entrepreneur; business owner; sales representative; member of the Alabama state house of representatives, 2010-2018; Delegate, Republican National Convention, 2016; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress in 2018; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2021-present).
